message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even at that price.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your perspective on the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I value your interest, the  $12,000 price reflects the true worth of this product. Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I understand the value you place on the product, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to offer $10,200 for it. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
